title: Game Won't Start After Champ Select
body:
hello!
I have a problem with lol where when i start up a game and i choose the champion i wanna play, but when the game starts, it says the game crashed and when i try and reconnect, i cant and people report me for leaving!
just to tell you, I bought a new graphics card,updated all the drivers, and still nothing.

Anyway, if someone finds a solution, thank you in advance!

replies.body: Do you receive a network disconnection message or a Bugsplat error, or, neither?
